successful_strategies.strategy: As villager: Question everything, challenge all claims, dig deep into contradictions
successful_strategies.learned: Won as villager! My deduction worked. Spoke 14 times. Keep questioning.

failed_strategies.strategy: As mafia: Question villagers to create paranoia, cast doubt on everyone, appear skeptical of all
failed_strategies.learned: Lost as mafia. Was I too obvious? Spoke 19 times. Need to blend better.
